headline: Nvidia, Microsoft back self-driving firm Wayve as it hits $8.6 billion valuation
summary: The $1.2 billion Series D round was led by Eclipse, Balderton and SoftBank Vision Fund 2

headline: Aptiv Refocuses On Intelligent Systems As EDS Spin Off Reshapes Exposure
summary: Aptiv (NYSE:APTV) plans to spin off its Electrical Distribution Systems (EDS) business into a separate company. The move is intended to narrow Aptiv’s focus to intelligent systems and interconnect technologies across automotive and non-automotive markets. Management is pairing the EDS separation with an emphasis on software, mergers and acquisitions, and growth in Asia-Pacific. Aptiv sits at the intersection of electronics, software and connectivity, supplying technology that supports...

headline: Automakers could start raising prices this year to offset tariffs, dealership executive says
summary: Tariff costs are becoming unsustainable for automakers, and they are going to have to raise prices or cut features, said the president of Sonic Automotive.
